issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: {{peerFromSocketAndKey}} performs the SASL exchange before setting up connection timeouts.  Because of this, the timeout used for setting up SASL connections is the default system-wide TCP timeout, which is usually several hours long.
fields.summary: peerFromSocketAndKey performs SASL exchange before setting connection timeouts

comments.body: Thank you, Colin.  This is a good catch.  In the test, would you please close {{serverSocket}} and {{socket}} in a {{finally}} block, or use try-with-resources?
* Add {{IOUtils#cleanup}} in the unit test in a finally block
+1 for patch v002, pending pre-commit.  Thank you for making the update.
